subject: Paralympic Games
Afghanistan War (2001- )
United States Defense and Military Forces
Iraq War (2003-11)
lead_paragraph: The reality of the Paralympics’ rise over the past decade could be seen in the biographies of so many of its athletes: former soldiers gravely wounded on far-flung battlefields.
